documentation.text:
@title TicketNFT - minimal ticketing NFT with escrow payment system
 @notice Prototype contract with secure escrow payments for ticket purchases
@notice Create a new event; anyone can create. Seller receives payments.
@notice Change seller payout wallet for an event.
@notice Add a ticket type for an event. Only event seller or owner can add.

typeDescriptions.typeString: mapping(uint256 => mapping(uint256 => struct TicketNFT.TicketType storage ref))
mapping(uint256 => mapping(uint256 => struct TicketNFT.TicketType storage ref))

documentation.text: @notice Buy a ticket; payment is forwarded to the event's seller immediately (legacy mode)
@notice Check if escrow is enabled and configured
@notice Get all tokens owned by an address

typeDescriptions.typeString: mapping(uint256 => mapping(uint256 => struct TicketNFT.TicketType storage ref))
mapping(uint256 => mapping(uint256 => struct TicketNFT.TicketType storage ref))

devdoc.title: TicketNFT - minimal ticketing NFT with escrow payment system

addTicketType(uint256,string,uint256,uin.notice: Add a ticket type for an event. Only event seller or owner can add.

buyTicket(uint256,uint256).notice: Buy a ticket; payment is forwarded to the event's seller immediately (legacy mode)

buyTicketWithEscrow(uint256,uint256).notice: Buy a ticket with escrow - funds held until delivery confirmed

createEvent(string,address).notice: Create a new event; anyone can create. Seller receives payments.

getTokensOf(address).notice: Get all tokens owned by an address

isEscrowReady().notice: Check if escrow is enabled and configured

setEventSeller(uint256,address).notice: Change seller payout wallet for an event.

userdoc.notice: Prototype contract with secure escrow payments for ticket purchases
